author: Sam McNeil | AP
title: China's virus pandemic epicenter Wuhan ends 76-day lockdown
description: The lockdown that served as a model for countries battling the coronavirus around the world ended after 11 weeks Wednesday
content: As of just after midnight Wednesday, the citys 11 million residents are now permitted to leave without special authorization as long as a mandatory smartphone application powered by a mix of data-tracking and government surveillance shows they are healthy and… [+5323 chars]
